tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the best decisions I had ever made is to consult with Dr . Pavithra mam for my pregnancy. She is one of a kind *** * ****** *** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** ****** * She is so patient, down to earth , very positive and such a good listener. I was able to ask and discuss with her silliest of my concerns and she would patiently respond to me . She guided me perfectly throughout my pregnancy, she exactly knows what to do and  I was able to deliver my baby with the  least of the complications. I was a bit nervous during my pregnancy period but every time I visit her during my check ups she cheers me up with tons of positivity and every single  time I come out of her room with a smiling face. And tell me which doctor these days give their personal number to us and responds to us immediately even for the text message we send !!! Thank you so much mam for everything and sending loads of love . Thank you once again for being u and doing what you are doing .!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am very thankful to Dr E Pavithra Balaji Mam, I am  more grateful and  appreciative her behaviour and humanity. Last 7 months back, it was diagnosed as PCOS and I was very upset and depressed about this issue enquired in my body. Thereafter, I found Pavithra mam on google web source and visited at her place Nungambakkam. I discussed all my problems and primarly, she has given a positive and moral support including medications. The place Nunambakkam was very far from my home and she suggested not to come here, I also do practice in Sugam Hospital, Tambaram. She took care  all my expenses spent for travelling from my home to Nungambakkam. Then, I visited to the suggested Hospital and met her for the issue. She always give moral support before prescription of the medicines, that I like most. After 7 months treatment, I am permanently cured from her treatment/medication, positive attutide and  moral support.  This time, no cysts seen in both the ovaries.  After God, I am again more thankful to Mam. The best thing is that she does not ask to go for more number of blood test, she suggested only the required test and saved our money. During this pandemic, I was stuck at my native place in north indian region and she always been in contact on phone at all the time. She always put attention on her patients and give positive response. Even if you are late on your scheduled time, she can wait and see her patients in all possible ways. I feel more proud to be a patient of Dr Pavithra Mam, and recommend to all those who are wasting their time here and there in other hospitals. Please visit at once and you will feel whatever I said, its 100% true. Once again thank to God who has chosen Dr Pavithra mam to resolve my medical problem. Thank you Mam.
reply_text: Thank u Sana for ur kind words..take care..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had visited Sugam hospital to consult Gynecologist and i met Dr Pavithra Balaji, i had given birth for my first baby in the same hospital hence i had visited for my 2nd baby also. When i saw her first time i got little scared about madam experience but when i came out from hospital i was completely satisfied of madam's positive speech and kindness so i felt more confidence and strength . Madam won't call us un necessarily to hospital for other than mandatory scan and other test which is required for pregnant lady. If any doubt arise i used to call Madam over the phone and always madam responds to me. For my first baby i was hospitalised for 6 days and for complete recovery it was around a month.  Had taken more medicines also but for my 2 nd baby i got discharged in third day and this time i underwent sterilisation also and i completely recovered in 2 weeks but i have taken less medicine this time. She is always listening us first then giving treatment or suggessions as a friend as a well wisher, half of the illness will be cured by her positive speech. I cannot say simply thanks to madam but words are not enough to describe. If anybody wants to go for normal delivery i will prefer Pavithra Madam( Our Angel).
reply_text: Thank u karthika for ur kind words...take care

tags: None
review: Am really glad to share my views regarding my fertility treatment with the guidance of Dr.Pavithra Balaji in Pavithram Specialist Clinic-Choolaimedu.Past 5 years v have been treated for infertility upto nearly 7 doctors...always hoping for a good result,but none have detacted the real problem on us... finally this lockdown actually helped us to knock the doors of Pavithram clinic unexpectedly on April 17th which is nearby my home too...,one month completely Pavi mam Observed my health,body systems completely regarding pregnancy,with complete care,love,cheerful words,which made us really positive.Then on May 27th I have been undergone Dyno systo laparoscopy by Pavi mam,She cleared my polyps,endometriosis,con-joint fallopian tubes with ovaries & DMC.....none have said us about these problems in me before.I was recovered within a month & hoping for the best result now.....vr feeling dis is r time.Painless treatment,Good scan facilities,lab facilities,Clean, hygiene,Positivewords,Caring,Good ambience,Detailed explanation, Friendly staffs too..***** ********* ******* ***************these words r  nt just for sack....feel it.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Been having PCOD issues since when I started menstruating. Dr. Pavithra is very patient she helped me understand that PCOD is not the end of fertility. She told that it could be treated without any big operations. A lot of healthy lifestyle changes is what helped me. She helped me without burning a hole through my pockets. I blindly recommend Dr. Pavithra. She is good and genuine.

tags: None
review: She was very polite and friendly with patients. Explaining things very clearly which is really helpful especially like me who stays alone and doesn't get any guidance from elders except few friends. Luckily got connect to her and felt happy and safe to get treatment here...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Excellent conversation with doctor. Dr. E Pavithra Balaji was very patient and listened to me thoroughly. Her conversation was very friendly and confident boosting. *** ******* ********* *** ********* *** her approach made me think, I have made the correct decision approaching her for my PCOD problem. I would love to consult and get treated by Dr. E Pavithra Balaji going forward. Thanks to Practo for helping me identify Dr. E Pavithra Balaji  through your app.

Basically she makes us feel very comfortable and assured. This is what every patients needs on the first hand. Her response for the calls itself says the care she takes regarding her patients. I would highly recommend her regarding pregnancy and parturition.
